scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development nodemon --watch "src/**/*.ts" --exec "ts-node -r dotenv/config" index.ts
scripts.staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.staging nodemon --watch "src/**/*.ts" --exec "ts-node -r dotenv/config" index.ts
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
scripts.production: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
